1. Diabetes drug helps the immune system recognize reservoirs of HIV, study discovers  Medical Xpress
  2. Antidiabetic Drug Metformin Could Help Immune System Recognize HIV  Managed Healthcare Executive
  3. How Metformin May Help Fight HIV  DocWire News
  4. A clinical study from Multicare led to another critical drug entering the fight against HIV  KXLY Spokane
  5. New treatment in fight against HIV  KXLY Spokane
